short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bringing the ChatGPT app's features to the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds enhanced function to ChatGPT (https://chat.openai.com/chat)
*All features require an OpenAi API Key*

Version 1: 

- Adds a microphone button to ChatGPT to enable text to speech powered by Whisper-1 by OpenAi
